name: hm06
effect: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dive to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Rock Smash Gen II: Whirlpool)

flavor_text.black_white: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the second. It can be used for diving in the ocean.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the second. It can be used for diving in the ocean.
